channel.title: Actions on Piklist Documentation

item.title: edit_term_taxonomy

item.description: Triggers when field events are fired. do_action("piklist_event_{$active_field['scope']}_field", $active_field); Class class-piklist-field.php Arguments $active_field['scope'] $active_field

item.title: piklist_parts_process

item.description: do_action("piklist_parts_processed-{$folder}"); Class class-piklist.php Arguments $folder The parts folder where the file is located ( e.g. meta-boxes, notices, terms, users, etc.).

item.title: piklist_plugin_loaded-' . $type
